_comment_version: Configuration file format version - do not modify
_comment_channels: List of Telegram channels/groups to monitor and scrape

channels._comment_channel_id: Unique identifier for the channel (can be numeric ID or username)
channels._comment_channel_name: Human-readable name for the channel (for display purposes)
channels._comment_channel_username: Channel username without @ symbol (optional, null if private channel)
channels._comment_reactions: List of emoji reactions to use when interacting with this channel

reactions._comment_emoji: Unicode emoji character to use as reaction
reactions._comment_weight: Weight/probability for this reaction (higher = more likely to be selected)

channels._comment_scraping_enabled: Whether to allow scraping operations on this channel (true/false)
channels._comment_monitoring_enabled: Whether to actively monitor this channel for new messages (true/false)
channels._comment_created_at: Unix timestamp when this channel was added to configuration

channels._comment_private_channel: Example of a private channel configuration (no username)

_comment_jobs: List of scheduled jobs for automated operations

jobs._comment_job_id: Unique identifier for this job (used for management operations)
jobs._comment_schedule_interval: How often to run this job in hours (e.g., 12 = every 12 hours)
jobs._comment_target_channel: Channel ID to operate on (must match a channel_id from channels list)

parameters._comment_days_back: For scraping jobs: how many days of history to scrape
parameters._comment_output_dir: Directory where scraping results will be saved
parameters._comment_include_statistics: Whether to generate statistics about scraped links

jobs._comment_enabled: Whether this job is active (false = job exists but won't run)
jobs._comment_created_at: Unix timestamp when this job was created

parameters._comment_include_details: Whether to include detailed member information (bio, username, etc.)

parameters._comment_filter_keywords: Optional: only save messages containing these keywords
parameters._comment_include_media: Whether to download and save media files from messages

jobs._comment_bulk_send_job: Example of a scheduled bulk message sending job

parameters._comment_csv_file: Path to CSV file containing recipients and message content
parameters._comment_message_template: Template for message content (can use variables from CSV)
parameters._comment_delay_between_messages: Delay in seconds between each message (to avoid rate limits)
parameters._comment_skip_blacklisted: Whether to skip users on the blacklist

_comment_preferences: Global preferences for CLI panel behavior

preferences._comment_default_delay: Default delay in seconds between operations (to avoid rate limits)
preferences._comment_auto_save: Whether to automatically save configuration after changes (true/false)
preferences._comment_show_progress: Whether to display progress bars during long operations (true/false)
preferences._comment_max_concurrent_operations: Maximum number of concurrent scraping/sending operations
preferences._comment_retry_attempts: Number of times to retry failed operations
preferences._comment_retry_delay: Delay in seconds between retry attempts
preferences._comment_output_format: Default output format for scraping results: 'json' or 'csv'
preferences._comment_date_format: Date format for display and file naming (Python strftime format)
preferences._comment_color_output: Whether to use colored output in terminal (true/false)
preferences._comment_confirm_destructive_operations: Whether to ask for confirmation before deleting/clearing data
preferences._comment_backup_config: Whether to create backup of config file before saving changes
preferences._comment_session_timeout: Session timeout in seconds (0 = no timeout)
